info.name: DropNest APIs
info.description: Simplified API collection for a logistics delivery system using ground robots and drones in San Francisco. The system supports package pickup and delivery with real-time tracking. This is designed for simulation purposes with simplified payment and review systems.

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Register a new user account. Requires email (must be unique), password (minimum 6 characters), phone number (format: 415-555-0123), and full name. Returns JWT token and user information upon successful registration.
Authenticate user with email and password. Returns JWT token for authenticated requests. Token expires in 24 hours.
Logout current user and invalidate the JWT token. This will blacklist the token on the server side.

item.description: User authentication endpoints for registration, login and logout

item.name: User Management

request.description: Get current authenticated user's profile information including basic details, order statistics, and account creation date.
Update user profile information. Only name and phone number can be updated. Email cannot be changed through this endpoint.
Change user password. Requires current password for verification. New password must be at least 6 characters long.

item.description: User profile management endpoints for viewing and updating user information

item.name: Address Management

request.description: Get all saved addresses for the current user. Returns addresses with labels (Home, Office, Other), contact information, and coordinates for delivery routing.

request.description: Add a new delivery address. Label options are: 'Home', 'Office', or 'Other'. Coordinates (latitude/longitude) are required for accurate delivery routing.
Update an existing address by address ID. All fields can be modified except addressId.
Delete a saved address.

item.description: Manage saved delivery addresses with labels, coordinates, and contact information. No default address functionality.

item.name: Orders

request.description: Calculate order price before placing order. Both pickup and delivery addresses must be selected from user's saved addresses using addressId. DeliveryType options: 'ROBOT' (ground robot, max 30kg, slower but cheaper) or 'DRONE' (aerial drone, max 5kg, faster but more expensive). Speed options: 'BASIC' (2 hours, 1.0x price), 'STANDARD' (1 hour, 1.2x price), 'EXPRESS' (30 minutes, 1.5x price). Weight in kg, volume in liters. System automatically selects the nearest available station.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Create a new delivery order. Both pickup and delivery addresses must be selected from user's saved addresses using addressId. The order will be created with status 'PENDING_PAYMENT' and must be paid within 15 minutes. System automatically assigns the nearest available station and generates a unique tracking number. requireSignature field determines if delivery confirmation is needed.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Get paginated list of user's orders. Optional status filter can be used. Status options: 'PENDING_PAYMENT', 'PAID', 'PREPARING', 'PICKING_UP', 'PICKED_UP', 'DELIVERING', 'DELIVERED', 'COMPLETED', 'CANCELLED', 'FAILED'. Orders are returned in descending order by creation date.

Get detailed information about a specific order including current status, status history, assigned device information, addresses, items, pricing, and tracking details. Also indicates if the order can still be cancelled.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Cancel an order. Only available for orders in 'PENDING_PAYMENT', 'PAID', or 'PREPARING' status. Once the device starts pickup ('PICKING_UP' status), the order cannot be cancelled. Cancelled orders will receive automatic refunds if already paid.

Confirm delivery receipt. Required for orders with requireSignature=true. Changes order status from 'DELIVERED' to 'COMPLETED'. For simulation purposes, signature is simplified to just a name confirmation.

item.description: Order management endpoints with simplified status tracking. Order statuses: PENDING_PAYMENT → PAID → PREPARING → PICKING_UP → PICKED_UP → DELIVERING → DELIVERED → COMPLETED (or CANCELLED/FAILED). Both pickup and delivery addresses are selected from saved addresses.

item.name: Real-time Tracking

request.description: Get current real-time location and tracking information for an active order. Returns device location, route information, estimated arrival time, and delivery progress. Only available for orders in 'PICKING_UP' or 'DELIVERING' status.

response.name: Success Response

item.description: Real-time tracking for active deliveries with device location, route progress, and ETA

item.name: Payments

request.description: Simplified payment for simulation. Payment methods available: 'CREDIT_CARD', 'DEBIT_CARD', 'PAYPAL', 'APPLE_PAY', 'GOOGLE_PAY'. For simulation, all payments are automatically approved and the order status changes to 'PAID'.
Get user's payment history with pagination. Shows all payment transactions including successful payments and refunds.

item.description: Simplified payment system for simulation - all payments auto-approve

item.name: Reviews

request.description: Submit a simple review for completed orders. Rating scale: 1-5 stars (1=Poor, 2=Fair, 3=Good, 4=Very Good, 5=Excellent). Comment is optional but recommended. Only available for orders with 'COMPLETED' status.
Get the review submitted for a specific order, if any exists.

item.description: Simplified review system with 1-5 star ratings and optional comments

item.name: Configuration

request.description: Get available delivery types with their specifications and pricing. Two types available: 'ROBOT' (ground-based, higher weight capacity, slower, cheaper) and 'DRONE' (aerial, lighter loads only, faster, more expensive). Weight limits and pricing are clearly defined for each type.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:

request.description: Get available delivery speed options with time estimates and price multipliers. Three options: 'BASIC' (2 hours, 1.0x price), 'STANDARD' (1 hour, 1.2x price), 'EXPRESS' (30 minutes, 1.5x price). Actual delivery times may vary based on distance and traffic conditions.

response.name: Success Response

item.description: System configuration endpoints for delivery types, speed options, and restrictions

item.name: WebSocket

request.description: WebSocket connection for real-time order tracking. Provides live location updates every 5 seconds while order is in 'PICKING_UP' or 'DELIVERING' status. Message format includes location coordinates, speed, heading, battery level, and estimated arrival time. Connection automatically closes when order reaches 'DELIVERED' status.

item.description: Real-time tracking via WebSocket for live delivery updates
